Initial commit: TikTok follower cleanup automation script

Add Python script to automatically unfollow banned/deleted TikTok accounts
with rate limiting to avoid hitting platform limits.

Features:
- Playwright-based browser automation
- Automated login with MFA/2FA support
- Follower list scraping and loading
- Detection of banned/deleted accounts
- Rate-limited unfollowing (configurable batch size and delays)
- State persistence for resumable operations
- Comprehensive documentation
